content: I've actually been thinking about that. I recently visited my friend Emma's art studio, and she's a talented painter. I ended up buying one of her smaller pieces, a lovely mini-canvas titled "Sunset Dreams". It's on my bedside table, and it's become a great addition to my morning routine. I've also been following an online art course on mixed media collage, and I've started working on a few pieces of my own using old maps, newspaper clippings, and fabric scraps. It's been really inspiring to see what other students are creating.
